articles.title: Netflix Must Pay $42 Million In Writer's Residuals - IGN
articles.description: Netflix is being forced to pay at least $42 million in writers' residuals after the WGA won an arbitration ruling.
articles.content:
Streaming giant Netflix has lost a case against the Writers Guild of America, and must pay $42 million in unpaid residuals.
